Text: Synopsis:  Seems like a bunch of English writers got together and decided they wanted to produce a show like The Wire but in London, England instead of B'more.
Thanks for the Shadow Line hook up Edward 2 Times.  Looks promising.

I checked out the season of shadow line.  That was some serious t.v.  It was slow moving but in a way that was really intense.  I loved the filming style.  The writing was superb.  I love it when a show is so well planned and written that the entire season works out to be one whole story as opposed to a series of episodes.

Going to start Spiral after today's episodes of The Newsroom and Line of Duty.

British Crime Shows IMHO are the ONLY crime shows worth watching.  i hunger for them.  am in Oz, and we have some good ones too, but they don't last long.  Viewers have no taste!!!! Heehee  Looking forward to this series.  Thank you.
